Lyric:
[by:Scarecrow__]
[00:12.248] Yeah I know that the woes and the weight of the world can get in side our minds
[00:17.692] And be too much sometimes
[00:20.682] I know
[00:23.927] But baby don't let the no's and the ups and the downs from the rollercoaster ride
[00:29.651] Beat you up inside
[00:32.467] Baby don't
[00:35.471] But if you ever feel that way, don't you ever hesitate, cause
[00:42.434] You got my number you can call on me
[00:45.430] If you're in trouble put the fall on me
[00:47.820] When you're mad you can take it out on me
[00:51.244] When it don't add up you can count on me
[00:54.391] When you're low come get high on me
[00:57.342] Make it slow take your time on me
[00:59.473] Settle in, let it out
[01:01.170] Come and lay on me
[01:03.101] When it gets heavy put the weight on me
[01:05.671] Baby put it all on me
[01:10.723] Put it all on me
[01:12.143] 
[01:16.937] Wanna take you out on the town on my dime anytime
[01:20.694] Tell me when you're free
[01:22.899] We can do anything and everything you want yeah
[01:28.786] Oh I wanna hear all your fears and your troubles
[01:31.908] Strip it down, really get to know one another
[01:35.103] When it's nobody but you and me just us
[01:40.673] Girl you know I'm here for you
[01:44.009] You can lean on me anytime you need to
[01:47.734] You got my number, you can call on me
[01:50.645] If you're in trouble put the fall on me
[01:53.050] When you're mad you can take it out on me
[01:56.497] When it don't add up you can count on me
[01:59.579] When you're low come get high on me
[02:02.480] Make it slow take your time on me
[02:04.754] Settle in, let it out
[02:06.207] Come and lay on me
[02:08.288] When it gets heavy put the weight on me
[02:10.823] Baby put it all on me
[02:15.467] Girl put it all on me
[02:17.526] 
[02:29.147] C'mon relax your mind on me
[02:32.057] When you need a shoulder you can cry on me
[02:34.777] Baby you can bet your life on me
[02:38.812] Put it all on me
[02:41.048] You got my number, you can call on me
[02:43.859] If you're in trouble put the fall on me
[02:46.290] When you're mad you can take it out on me
[02:49.826] When it don't add up you can count on me
[02:52.931] When you're low come get high on me
[02:55.853] Make it slow take your time on me
[02:58.157] Settel in, let it out
[02:59.569] Come and lay on me
[03:01.729] When it gets heavy put the weight on me
[03:04.153] Baby put it all on me
[03:09.537] Yeah baby put it all on me
[03:18.065] Put it all on me, yeah
[03:26.441] Girl put it all on me
[03:33.140] Put it all on me
